text: Thomas Richard Nides (born 1961)Year inferred approximately from is an American banker and politician. He was the United States Ambassador to Israel from December 2021 to July 2023, under the Joe Biden administration. From 2013 to 2021, he was the managing director and vice-chairman of Morgan Stanley. He was the United States Deputy Secretary of State for Management and Resources from 2011 to 2013, during the Barack Obama administration. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Israel Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota Category:People from Duluth, Minnesota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thomas R. Nides
